message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm really interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $8500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $8750?
